name: NetIDme
overview:
NetIDme specialises in digital identity management, and secure communication solutions. NetIDme was established in 2004 to provide internet users with a secure method of managing their digital identity. NetIDme is the only user authentication service that offers a service for both adults and young people. NetIDme’s age & ID verification products are used throughout the UK, USA, Canada, & Australia.

The core service, netidme.com, allows individuals to have their details verified online, enabling them to share their own secure, virtual ID cards, with other trusted parties.

NetID ChatShield is a free parental control tool that parents can download in order to help protect their children from being contacted by strangers in the popular IM service, Windows Live Messenger.

NetID ChatSure is a secure instant messaging service for businesses that enables companies to set and enforce security and compliance policies, keep audit-ready archives, and standardize instant messaging on a secure, encrypted messaging platform.

NetID Verify is an ID verification service that online communities can integrate into their own systems, in order to confirm the age or identity of their customers prior to transactions taking place.
